returns.description: An async function that shows a confirmation dialog and resolves with a boolean indicating whether the confirm button was used.

properties.name: title
properties.description: The title of the ConfirmationDialog. This is usually a brief question.

properties.name: cancelButtonContent
properties.description: The text to use for the cancel button.

properties.name: confirmButtonContent
properties.description: The text to use for the confirm button.

properties.name: confirmButtonType
properties.description: The type of button to use for the confirm button.
